General.Name: AIC Inc
General.Description: AIC Inc. provides OEM/ODM, commercial off-the-shelf, and server and storage solutions in the United States, Asia, and Europe. The company offers rackmount, multi-node, GPU, and network security servers; storage, just a bunch of disks, just a bunch of extensions, high availability, and all-flash NVMe servers; industrial PC and server chassis products; accessories, such as canisters and front bezels; and AMD EPYC systems. It also provides cloud/data center, network appliance, media entertainment, industrial PC, and video surveillance solutions. The company was formerly known as T-win Systems, Inc. and changed its name to AIC Inc. in June 2011. AIC Inc. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 152, Linghang North Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 337
